pma:database.name: aldan-project
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `blog_posts` ( `id_post` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `title` varchar(35) NOT NULL, `description` text NOT NULL, `content` text NOT NULL, `img` varchar(15) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_post`), UNIQUE KEY `id_post` (`id_post`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

table.name: blog_posts
